goal.en: Improve the ability for students in formulating the mathematical model and solving the model using solution algorithms.
goal.ch: 訓練學生數學規劃及邏輯能力，以解決實務問題。

content.en:
“1. Introduction to linear optimization and its extensions, emphasizing theoretical foundations and algorithms.
2. Formulation and solution of linear and integer optimization models.
3. Simplex method, sensitivity analysis, duality theory, network models, and decomposition procedures.
4. Introduction to dynamic programming and nonlinear programming.“
content.ch:
1.線性規劃
2.敏感度分析
3.Duality Theory
4.Convexity and Polyhedron
5.遊戲原理
6.Dantzig-Wolf Decomposition
7.整數規劃
8.網路分析
9.非線性規劃
10.Lagranrian Relaxation
11.Cutting Plane
12.Branch and Bound

textbook.en: 1. Handout; 2.Bradeley, S. P., A. C. Hax, and T. L. Magnant, Applied Mathematical Programming, Addison Wesley, 1977.“
textbook.ch:
“1.講義
2.Bradeley, S. P., A. C. Hax, and T. L. Magnant, Applied Mathematical Programming, Addison Wesley, 1977.“
